summary: 2015 YAMAHA FJ-09   OIL PAN  OIL PAN DRAIN PLUG     WHILE RIDING MY NEW FJ09 PURCHASED AT THE END OF MARCH I HIT A BUMP WITH MY LOVED ONE ON THE BACK AND FELT THE BIKE SCRAPE. IMMEDIATELY NOTICED A TRAIL OF OIL BEHIND ME AND A LOSS OF TRACTION. THANKFULLY I'VE GOT SOME RIDING ABILITY A D WAS ABLE TO MANAGE THIS SLIPPERY READ TIRE IN THE POURING RAIN BUT NOW THE PAN NEEDS REPLACED DUE TO A CRACK BY THE DRAIN PLUG.
